dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my god, I know, right?! Did you see this? Like, the Goldman Sachs report?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my god, I know, right?! Did you see this? Like, the Goldman Sachs report?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Now, a leaked report from Wall Street giant Goldman Sachs GS +1.8% has given ethereum, the second-largest cryptocurrency with a market capitalization of around $250 billion compared to bitcoin's $660 billion, a high chance of overtaking bitcoin as a dominant store of value

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: YES, EXACTLY! I mean, BTC is down almost fifty percent, uh, ETH is down even more, but then this!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Y E S, E X A C T L Y! I mean, B T C is down almost fifty percent, uh, E T H is down even more, but then this!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The bitcoin price has lost almost 50% of its value since hitting its all-time high of nearly $65,000 per bitcoin in April. Meanwhile, ethereum is down by more than half after climbing to over $4,000 per ether token earlier this month.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But then this, yes! "Amazon of the Metaverse" for Ethereum? Are you kidding me right now?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But then this, yes! Amazon of the Metaverse for Ethereum? Are you kidding me right now?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: a high chance of overtaking bitcoin as a dominant store of valuecalling it the Amazon AMZN -1.4% of information.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right?! And the idea that it could, like, actually overtake Bitcoin as the dominant store of value?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right?! And the idea that it could, like, actually overtake Bitcoin as the dominant store of value?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Given the importance of real uses in determining the store of value, ether has a high chance of overtaking bitcoin as a dominant store of value, analysts at Goldman Sachs wrote, according to leaked sections of the report shared on Twitter.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, exactly! JP Morgan even found it's 30% less risky now, like, what?!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, exactly! J P Morgan even found it's thirty percent less risky now, like, what?!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It's all about the real uses, you know? DeFi, NFTs, all that jazz, it's all on Ethereum.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's all about the real uses, you know? DeFi, NFTs, all that jazz, it's all on Ethereum.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Most decentralized finance (DeFi) applications are being built on the ethereum network, and most non-fungible tokens (NFTs) issued are purchased using ether.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Totally! It’s not just, like, a token, it fuels everything, unlike Bitcoin.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally! It's not just, like, a token, it fuels everything, unlike Bitcoin.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Unlike bitcoin, ethereum is not just a value token, meaning it actually fuels all use cases built on top of the ETH blockchain, Kosala Hemachandra, the chief executive of MyEtherWallet, said in emailed comments

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! Bitcoin's just… a value token, right? No clear roadmap, um, apparently.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! Bitcoin's just... a value token, right? No clear roadmap, um, apparently.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Bitcoin is simply a value token with no clear roadmap.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And those network upgrades coming, like, next year? Sky-high transaction costs, gone!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And those network upgrades coming, like, next year? Sky-high transaction costs, gone!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Meanwhile, some think long-awaited upgrades to ethereum, begun at the end of last year and designed to help ethereum scale and reduce its sky-high transaction costs, could help the ether price reach never-before-seen heights.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, exactly! And it's already outperformed Bitcoin, like, 1000% versus 300% in a year, even with this crash!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, exactly! And it's already outperformed Bitcoin, like, one thousand percent versus three hundred percent in a year, even with this crash!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Over the last 12 months, the ethereum price has far outpaced the bitcoin price, with ethereum adding around 1,000% compared to bitcoin's 300%, even when the last week's price crash is taken into account.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's insane! So, like, Ethereum's just, uh, completely taking over?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's insane! So, like, Ethereum's just, uh, completely taking over?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It really looks like it, honestly. Long-term development, totally unaffected.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really looks like it, honestly. Long-term development, totally unaffected.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Even with the price plunge, long-term development is unaffected and ethereum is well on its way to market dominance over bitcoin.
